[data-ref=unplanned] .b-grid-header.title: Unplanned tasks
[data-ref=unplanned] .b-grid-header.content:
Drag these tasks onto the schedule to assign to a resource.

Note: This demo uses the Bryntum Grid component which is licensed separately.

.b-sch-event.title: Unassign
.b-sch-event.content: Right click an event and select 'Unassign' to move it to unassigned tasks
